column2: Project Role : Application Designer Project Role Description : Assist in defining requirements and designing applications to meet business process and application requirements.  Must have skills : Microsoft Power BI Good to have skills : NA Minimum  3  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : NA Summary :As an Application Designer, you will be responsible for assisting in defining requirements and designing applications to meet business process and application requirements using Microsoft Power BI. Your typical day will involve working with cross-functional teams, analyzing data, and designing applications to meet business needs.  Roles & Responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and design applications using Microsoft Power BI. Analyze data and design dashboards, reports, and visualizations to meet business needs. Develop and maintain data models, data flows, and data integration processes using Microsoft Power BI. Ensure data accuracy, completeness, and integrity by performing data validation and testing. Stay updated with the latest advancements in Microsoft Power BI and data visualization tools. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Proficiency in Microsoft Power BI. Good To Have Skills:Experience with other data visualization tools such as Tableau or QlikView. Strong understanding of data modeling, data integration, and data validation techniques. Experience in designing and developing dashboards, reports, and visualizations using Microsoft Power BI. Solid grasp of SQL and other database technologies. Experience in working with cross-functional teams and understanding business requirements. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of experience in Microsoft Power BI. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, information technology, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful data-driven solutions. This position is based at our Hyderabad office. Qualification NA

Develop an understanding of industry trends and best practices related to Data Engineering and Open Source Big Data technologies.             Create and follow personal education plan in the technology stack and solution architecture.             Collaborate and contribute to agile teamwork. column1: Solution Architect - Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning
column2: Synopsis: We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated solution architect specializing in data science and machine learning to join our dynamic team. This is a unique opportunity to play a key role in shaping the future of our data-driven initiatives and contributing to the success of our organization. A Day in Your Life: Solution Architecture: - Design and architect end-to-end solutions for complex data science and machine learning projects. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into scalable, robust, and efficient technical solutions. - Provide technical leadership and guidance throughout the project lifecycle. Innovation and Technology Evaluation: - Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in data science and machine learning. - Evaluate and recommend new tools, frameworks, and methodologies to enhance the organization's capabilities. Project Management: - Lead and manage the execution of Data Science and Machine Learning projects, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to quality standards. - Work closely with project teams to identify and mitigate risks, and proactively address challenges Collaboration and Communication: - Foster collaboration between the data science, engineering, and business teams to ensure alignment with organizational goals. - Effectively communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Team Leadership and Development: - Provide mentorship and guidance to a team of data scientists and machine learning engineers. - Foster a culture of continuous learning and professional development within the team Skills in the spotlight: - Bachelors or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field. - 10+ years of experience in solution architecture with a focus on Data Science and Machine Learning. - Proven track record of successfully leading and delivering complex projects. - Technical Skills: Proficient in programming languages such as Python - Strong expertise in machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and data science tools. - Leadership and Communication: Excellent leadership and interpersonal skills. - Strong written and verbal communication skills. - Industry Knowledge: Familiarity with [industry/sector] and understanding of how Data Science and Machine Learning contribute to business objectives.

column2: We are currently hiring for a Database Architect who will be responsible for designing, implementing, and managing our databases to ensure optimal performance, scalability, and reliability. Working closely with stakeholders, such as software developers, data analysts, and system administrators, you will understand their requirements and translate them into effective database solutions.      Key Responsibilities         Database Design:    Design and develop database architectures, including conceptual, logical, and physical models, to meet our needs. Evaluate and select appropriate database technologies, considering factors such as performance, scalability, and cost-effectiveness.       Database Development:    Create and modify database objects, such as tables, views, stored procedures, and triggers. Write efficient and optimized SQL queries and optimize database performance through indexing, query tuning, and database parameter configuration.       Data Integration:    Design and implement strategies for data integration, data migration, and data synchronization between various systems and databases. Ensure smooth data flow and integrity across different platforms and applications.       Data Security and Privacy:    Implement robust security measures to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA). Define and enforce access controls, authentication mechanisms, and data encryption techniques.       Performance Optimization:    Monitor and analyze database performance metrics, identify bottlenecks, and implement performance tuning techniques. Conduct regular database capacity planning and scalability assessments.       Backup and Recovery:    Develop and implement backup and recovery strategies to ensure data availability and minimize downtime. Perform regular backups, test recovery procedures, and maintain disaster recovery plans.       Data Governance:    Establish and enforce data governance policies and procedures to maintain data quality, consistency, and standardization across the organization. Define and implement data management best practices.       Collaboration and Communication:    Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, system administrators, and data analysts, to understand their requirements and provide guidance on database-related matters. Effectively communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.       Documentation and Training:    Create and maintain comprehensive documentation, including database schemas, data dictionaries, and technical specifications. Conduct training sessions to educate users and developers on database-related topics.       Key Skills and Qualifications       Bachelor"s or Master"s degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field.     Proven work experience as a Database Architect or a similar role.     In-depth knowledge of database management systems (e.g., Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL) and related technologies.     Proficiency in database design principles, data modeling, and normalization techniques.     Strong SQL programming skills and experience with query optimization.     Familiarity with data integration and ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes.     Knowledge of database security principles and best practices.     Experience with performance monitoring and tuning tools.     Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.     Benefits      Opportunity to work for a great and innovative company.     Competitive salary.     Family health care.     25 days annual leave.
column11: Performance tuning, Data migration, Data management, Data modeling, Database design, Postgresql, MySQL, Stored procedures, Information technology, SQL

column2: A SQL Developer, also known as a Database Developer, is responsible for designing, implementing, and managing database systems and writing SQL queries to retrieve and manipulate data      The job description (JD) of a SQL Developer typically includes the following responsibilities and qualifications:        Job Responsibilities:        Database Design and Modeling: Create and maintain database schema designs, including tables, indexes, and relationships, using tools like ER diagrams      SQL Query Development: Write complex SQL queries, stored procedures, and triggers to extract, manipulate, and manage data efficiently      Database Optimization: Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks by optimizing SQL queries, indexing, and database configurations      Data Integration: Develop ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes to move data between different systems and databases      Data Security: Implement and maintain database security measures, including user access control, encryption, and data masking as necessary      Backup and Recovery: Establish and manage database backup and recovery procedures to ensure data integrity and availability      Performance Monitoring: Monitor database performance using tools like performance counters and query execution plans, and make necessary adjustments      Data Validation and Testing: Verify data accuracy through validation checks and perform unit testing and integration testing of SQL scripts      Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of database schemas, processes, and code changes      Collaboration: Collaborate with other teams, such as software developers and data analysts, to understand their data needs and provide necessary support      Version Control: Use version control systems to manage database code changes and collaborate effectively with team members      Troubleshooting: Diagnose and resolve database-related issues and provide technical support when needed
column11: metadata, data reporting, Packaging, OLAP, SSIS, SQL

column2: As a Junior Dashboard Engineer at      GroupM Nexus Global Team     , you will play a crucial role within our Data and Technology department. Your responsibilities will span across project management, data specification, analysis, reporting & visualisation, integration, product knowledge, people management, department support, and personal development.          You will be expected to      assist     in managing day-to-day project requirements, troubleshoot data issues, contribute to insight-rich reporting, and communicate effectively with other departments. This role is ideal for individuals who are passionate about data, have a knack for project management, and possess a deep understanding of data visualisation.         You will support our GCP Engineers transforming and moulding data from a variety of sources, such as Google Analytics; Campaign Manager; Search Ads 360; and client data. This data will build the foundations for us to provide industry leading solutions to transform our clients marketing and media activity.          You will also support our Data Scientist in         answering more ad hoc queries, building statistical and machine learning models and designing data visualisations based on client-specific needs.                         This is a thrilling opportunity for someone ready to dive into the world of data and cloud solutions. If      you're     someone who thrives on solving complex problems and finds joy in it, this role is for you.              We're     looking for someone with a keen eye for detail and a knack for presenting data in a visually compelling manner. Your determination to enhance our product offerings, innovate, and consistently drive our business forward will be key. We value fresh ideas and the ability to add even more value to our clients, and were excited for you to bring these to the table.         This is a rare and exciting opportunity to become part of one of the most innovative and progressive Media agencies in the world! As a core member of the      team     you will have opportunity to help define our product, work with, our industry-leading clients and the chance to build your career & your future the way you want it                     3         best things about the job                   1. You will learn a lot of different skills and be exposed to lots of BI Reporting and Google Cloud      tools         2         A         supportive         working environment         to         promote         a healthy work-life      harmony         3 Continuous mentorship and learning to support both career and personal      development               ?         Measures of success                 ?         In three months, you would have:             Have a good understanding of our internal/client GCP architecture, the media data landscape, current reporting tools and process and projects the wider team are working on.                     In six months, you would have:             tarted a learning path towards a GCP      certification         Started developing new Reporting Tools and Dashboards         Started working Closely with the GCP Data Engineers to shape and      optimize     the data you work with         Started supporting our client and internal media teams with data requests and enquiries.                     In 12 months, you will be:             Supporting Senior members of the team with projects.         Taken ownership of a few key internal process.         Helping to develop the next generation of products/ and      services         Run internal training sessions to help upskill junior members of the      team                                             Responsibilities of the role                     A     ssist     in managing day-to-day project requirements, relationships, and quality of work delivered.         Contribute to      build      visuallally         enageing     dashboard for our clients      and work with Data Engineers to deliver.         Assist     in troubleshooting errors, proactively investigate potential solutions, and      preempt         possible data     issues.         Contribute to professional, insight-rich reporting, stretching outputs and insights.         Communicate effectively with other      MediaCom     departments.         Attend meetings with key stakeholders and relevant teams.         Assist     in resolving any inter-company issues, such as data errors & reporting issues.         Build and      maintain     your personal profile and positive reputation within the business.         Support other team members when      required     .         Continue training and keeping up to date with the latest products and tech.                     What you will need                     Strong project management skills.         Proficiency     in using Jira for project management.         Familiarity with data sources and the ability to explain them in simplified terms.         Strong problem-solving skills, especially in relation to data issues.         Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.         A commitment to continuous learning and development.         The ability to work effectively in a team and independently.         A positive reputation within the business.         Eagerness to support other team members when      required     .         Comfortable working in an agile environment.         Strong problem-solving abilities and the      capacity     to work effectively in a team.         Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.         Eagerness to learn and adapt to      new technologies     .         Ability to hit the ground running and quickly adapt to new tasks.

column2: Data Analytics UtilitiesFind endless opportunities to solve our clients' toughest challenges, as you work with exceptional people, the latest tech and leading companies across industries.Practice:Utilities, Industry Consulting, Capability Network I Areas of Work:Strategy & Consulting | Level:9/7 | Location:Bengaluru/Gurugram/Mumbai/Pune | Years of Exp:5-15 yearsExplore an Exciting Career at AccentureAre you an outcome-oriented problem solver? Do you enjoy working on transformation strategies for global clients? Does working in an inclusive and collaborative environment spark your interest? Then, Accenture Strategy and Consulting is the right place for you to explore limitless possibilities.The Practice A Brief SketchAs a part of the Utilities practice within Accenture's Capability Network, you will work with our global teams to help investment banks, asset and wealth managers, and exchanges, prepare for the digital future.Together, let's leverage global strategies and data-driven insights to pave way for digital-enabled capital markets. Help us unlock new value in a disruptive world, with the following initiatives: Collaborate with client challenges to solve complex client problems such as regulatory reforms and implementation.  Define and manage the organization change with reference to process, technology and organization structure. Manage transformation project to migrate from legacy to target. Assess as-is process and suggest best industry practices to come up with to-be processes and implement them to remove inefficiencies. Support data governance and management and help optimize operations and drive business decision-making. Support in development of collateral, methodology refinements, best practices updates and trends tracking, create and support proposals incorporating Accenture value proposition. Incorporate Accenture best practices and help develop methodologies into every stage of the project management lifecycle.Bring your best skills forward to excel in the role: Good analytical and problem-solving skills  Excellent communication, interpersonal and presentation skills  Cross-cultural competence with an ability to thrive in a dynamic consulting environmentRead more about us.Recent Blogs Qualification Your experience counts! Bachelor Degree in a quantitative field like statistics/econometrics/mathematics/engineering/computer science MBA Degree from Tier-1 College (Preferable) Ideal candidate should be able to consult with Utilities clients offering their subject matter expertise in delivering data & analytics solutions with experience as follows: 5+ years experience in a consulting/industry role with Utilities exposure delivering data driven capabilities and solutions 3+ years of implementation experience in Asset Investment Planning tools (IBM Maximo/APM, Copperleaf, SAP IAM, Bentley APM, Aveva APM, Infor APM, GE Predix) 2+ years experience in designing and utilizing analytic solutions in enterprise-wide organizations or in a role defining data architecture for a cloud native solution or journey to cloud Experience guiding and managing a team of practitioners to execute data and analytics solutions, preferably both onshore and offshore 2+ years of experience of working in Asset Management with advanced knowledge of enterprise or application systems in Asset Management Services, Asset Lifecycle Management, Predictive Analytics and Reliability Centered Maintenance 3+ years experience in designing and utilizing analytic solutions in enterprise-wide organizations 3+ years in a role defining data architecture for a cloud native solution or journey to cloud Exceptional presentation skills ability to convey technology and business value propositions Experience interacting with clients or executives of all levels to review expected outputs, applicability to business challenges, and value measurementWhat's in it for you? An opportunity to work on transformative projects with key G2000 clients  Potential to Co-create with leaders in strategy, industry experts, enterprise function practitioners and, business intelligence professionals to shape and recommend innovative solutions that leverage emerging technologies. Ability to embed responsible business into everything-from how you service your clients to how you operate as a responsible professional.  Personalized training modules to develop your strategy & consulting acumen to grow your skills, industry knowledge and capabilities  Opportunity to thrive in a culture that is committed to accelerate equality for all. Engage in boundaryless collaboration across the entire organization.

column2: The Sr IT Technologist (Data Engineer) role is responsible for delivering data architecture solutions aligned with business capability needs and enterprise standards     This role works with DA Solution Architects, Business Solution Architects and Technical Architects and external service providers to ensure data and information models and technologies align with stated architecture strategies and Medtronic s standards and delivery capabilities     In a delivery capacity, this role will work with Business Analysts to review and complete business capability needs, definitions, and requirements, data analysis, data modeling, technical specification writing, and working with development organizations to ensure designs are delivered                     A DAY IN THE LIFE          Coordinate data model, flow, and technology aspects of solution architecture design, implementation, and modification activities across projects, teams and key process and technology leaders.      Ensure all data architecture aspects of solution design and analysis work within the Architecture Definition Document is documented and included in the architecture repositories. Generate Solution Architecture, Data Model, and ETL specifications to match business outcome requirements.      Consult with business and technology (application, infrastructure) development projects to fit systems and desired information outcomes to business capability needs, identify when it is necessary to modify the solution architecture to accommodate project needs.      Partner with Business Solution Architects and Analysts and Data Modelers on requirements gathering or clarification and ensure alignment to desired business outcomes.      Works with and advises stakeholders, project teams, and peers in areas assigned on project needs and design.      Estimate work effort for development and enhancement requests supporting individual projects and broader team and enterprise strategies.      Understand and use standard tools, processes, designs, and methodologies for project management, documentation, system development, and implementation.      Actively support the architecture process, its outcome and ongoing results to senior leadership across Medtronic business and technology globally.      Ensure adherence to the defined IT governance activities associated with the Solution Selection Policy Procedure (ie, architecture boards, governance councils).      Partner with the Enterprise Project Management Office (EPMO) to ensure alignment and execution of plans with project deliveries.      Ensure Medtronics systems and information are protected in accordance with Medtronics Information Protection Policies and Standards, as well as best Information Protection practices.              BASIC QUALIFICATIONS              You are a hands-on, pro-active professional who can keep oversight of complex processes      Future target end state is Snowflake, but you at least have experience with Oracle databases, data warehouses, data modelling, ETL and BI      You have experience with SQL, eg you are able to develop new ETL procedures and fine-tune existing SQL code for efficiency and maintenance reasons      SAP data structure/tables and/or functional knowledge      You are flexible and pragmatic, problem solving mindset      You have the ability to work independently with minimal supervision required      You are a team player      Excellent English communication skills (verbal written), Dutch is a plus      Experience with Agile/Scrum is a plus      Experience in the Supply Chain area is a plus              EDUCATION REQUIREMENT:          Bachelors Degree              YEARS OF EXPERIENCE:          5+ years of IT experience with Master s degree              SPECIALIZED SKILLS OR EXPERIENCE:          5+ years of experience aligned to a relevant architecture discipline (data engineering, analytics development)      3+ years of experience with cloud-based solutions (eg, applications (SaaS), platforms (PaaS), and infrastructure (IaaS)) within an Enterprise environment      Oracle, PL/SQL, Snowflake, SAP BW      Git Concepts      Informatica Cloud Integration Services (IICS)                      DESIRED/PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS         Previous Medtronic experience      5+ years of experience working with large enterprise systems solutions      Excellent leadership and teamwork skills      Strong analytical and critical thinking skills      Strong collaboration and influencing skills      Broad knowledge of data analysis/database design technologies/tools in an operational environment      Strong technical acumen, decision making, and influence skills across all levels of an organization      Strong communication skills, including with employees, clients, senior management and vendors      Solid presentation skills, including the ability to translate data concepts and technical information into business terms (eg, ability to explain complex technical solutions and architecture strategies to non-technical resources)      Strong results orientation (driving to deadlines, financial targets, project goals, etc)      Ability to work collaboratively and partner with employees, leaders, clients, and vendors      Demonstrated ability to work in a global, virtual organization      Work experience in the Medical Device Industry, or other regulated industry      Ability to mentor and develop business, architecture, and technical resources      Able to work independently as well as cooperatively

column2: GCH Bridge/ IMDRF Technical Lead Role:          Technical lead for complaint handling/IMDRF bridge, which sends potential complaints from clinical trials to complaint handling system and sends adverse events and device deficiencies to IMDRF coding system.                  There are several releases throughout the year      , which consist of adding new      clinical      studies      ,      updates      to data for existing studies          and          o      ccasionally      ,      updates to      the overall bridge logic                  This role      is responsible for      ensuring the      accuracy and consistency of      the      changes      in each release.                        Job Description                      Responsibilities may include the following and other duties may be assigned.                        Engages with business leaders to understand how strategies and data-driven changes can improve efficiencies and add value.                  Work with data sets to define use cases to improve products, processes and/or services.                  Collaborates with Business Relationship Manager (BRM), business stakeholders and IT Product Owners / Managers to develop business requirements for product or system changes.                  Drives business agenda during solution delivery process.                  Functional Skills: Ability to analyze data and trends      in order to      develop recommendations to solve business problems.                  Additional Skills: Problem Solving, Detail Oriented, Cross-Functional Collaboration, Customer Service, Process Improvement, Communication.                  Technology: Understanding of systems, software and technological concepts, Familiarity with data analysis tools and data modeling methodologies.                  A Day in the Life                        Participate in requirements meetings, and provide input/feedback for requirements as needed, to ensure consistency with bridge logic and standards      .                      Create data mapping      document      for      new studies      and updates. Design the standard/custom profiles such that studies can reuse the mappings.      Conduct impact assessment to e      nsure new study design does not      impact      existing studies or bridge logic. Review document with developer      to ensure      understanding                  Direct mapping developer as needed during development. Answer questions, make decisions about how to map data as needed.      Ensure BA is aware of changes and how that      impacts      the data that is sent via the bridge.                  Conduct code review for mapping development. Ensure standards are met      .          Review and update development standards as      needed                  Help write the test conditions to ensure all data is tested thoroughly, for new study as well as regression based on updates to existing functionality as needed.                  Review test scripts to ensure everything is being tested thoroughly.                  Help triage and/or resolve defects      identified      during testing.                  Help identify/provide resolution for production issues escalated by support team.                  Point person for technical questions      regarding      the bridge.              Update bridge design documents, direct design discussions and development for any bridge logic changes                  As needed, c      omplete development for bridge logic and/or study mapping      -          (      this is more of a good to have, not      required      )      .                  Collaborat      e      with      clinical development      partners          in designing improved      bridge      interface model which can be      leveraged      by both GCH bridge and safety reports.                  Identify      areas of improvement for efficiency      and standards for the bridge                        Must Have: Minimum Requirements                    Requires mastery of PL/SQL and full knowledge of industry practices, typically obtained through advanced education combined with experience.                  May have broad knowledge of project management.                  Requires 7+ years of experience with a bachelor s degree or 5+ years of experience with an advanced degree or 12+ years of experience with a High School Diploma or equivalent.                  Experience in      the following application      s      is      highly desired      - Oracle Clinical, Medidata RAVE, Life Sciences      Hub      .                  Experience with data integrations and sending data from one system to      another                  Experience with troubleshooting and problem solving in complex environments      , multiple      systems      and multiple      teams                    Nice to Have                            SPECIALIST CAREER STREAM:          Typically, an individual contributor with responsibility in a professional discipline or specialty.              Delivers and/or manages projects assigned and works with other stakeholders to achieve desired results. May act as a mentor to colleagues or may direct the work of other      lower level      professionals.                  The majority of      time is spent delivering and overseeing the projects - from design to implementation - while and adhering to policies, using specialized knowledge and skills normally      acquired      through advanced education.                                  DIFFERENTIATING FACTORS                      Autonomy:          Recognized expert, managing large projects or processes.                                Exercises considerable latitude in      determining      deliverables of assignments, with limited oversight from manager.                              Coaches,      reviews      and delegates work      to      lower-level specialists.                      Organizational Impact:          Contributes to defining the direction for new products, processes, standards, or operational plans based on business strategy with a significant impact on work group results.                                May manage large projects or processes that span outside of immediate job area.                      Innovation and Complexity:          Problems and issues faced are difficult, moderately      complex      and undefined, and require detailed information gathering, analysis and investigation.                                Develops solutions to moderately complex problems, and/or makes moderate to significant improvements of processes,      systems      or products independently to enhance performance of job area.                    Implements solutions to problems.                      Communication and Influence:          Represents organization as a primary contact for specific projects and initiatives; communicates with internal and external customers and vendors at various levels.                                May negotiate with others to reach understanding or agreement, and influence decision-making.                      Leadership and Talent Management:          Typically      provides      guidance, coaching and training to other employees within      job      area.                                Typically manages major / moderately complex projects, involving delegation of work and review of work products, at times acting as a team leader.

column2: Job Summary A senior ASIC digital design engineer who is analog aware. The candidate will have the opportunity to develop IP cores used in processor market specially for RISC-V and other ISAs like ARM,  Tensilica. The candidate should have an MSEE completed at the time of joining as full-time employee. Candidates finishing their degree maybe offered internship leading to full time employment. The candidate must be willing to take ownership critical components for exciting,  state of the art projects in the explosive data-center,  cloud,  AI and machine learning space offering lowest power semiconductor solutions. The candidate should enjoy working with a global team under pressure to beat the competition. This can be a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity for the right candidate and can rapidly lead to larger responsibilities and rewards. Compensation will match experience,  degree,  motivation and drive. Entry levels considered provide they have a strong course work and relevant project experience background. Key responsibilities & Tasks SoC Design services for use of Library Cells using patented IP of Rezonent Qualification of Library development in DSM including FinFETs for adoption by customers Support Tape out of bench-mark test chips and characterization for customer design wins Delivers results in time as per MBOs (Management By Objectives) Verilog modelling and Regression analysis for First silicon success methodology development Contribute to the achievement of the aggressive objectives as stated in Rezonent Principles Support global team?s efforts with flexible times and places as needed Synthesis and verification of SoC with custom flows developed APR and floorplan and layout guideline Support technology transfer to product to development teams Debug and characterization of design Developing System Architecture and/ or module level Microarchitecture specifications Job Requirements Education/ experience Candidate must have a BSEE with 5 yrs or MSEE with 2 years ASIC design and verification experience on job or with credited projects Actual DSM tape out experience a HUGE plus Track record using flow in Synopsys/ Cadence for CMOS DSM technologies Hands-on experience with Verilog RTL coding and debug Problem solving and analytical skills FPGA prototype debug and system bring up skills Expertise with debug equipment such as analysers and scopes Expertise in ISA architecture like RISC-V a plus Good written and spoken communication skills and technical documentation skills Technical leadership and project management skills Offer Highly competitive customized compensation packages Making a difference in world with technology of societal impact Challenging environment,  young and dynamic atmosphere. Opportunity to work in the challenging world-wide growth market Educational benefits & Development Reimburse relevant course work Sponsorship for PhD/ post-doc programs Attendance to top IEEE conferences among others You will gain global team experience working on state-of-art technology and acquire state-of-art-skill-sets pushing the limits of performance/ power standards to save the planet. Rezonent also takes care of all special needs of talented work-force. We are an equal opportunity affirmative action employer.

column2: The role is critical to product development and is responsible for shaping and scaling the data management solution. The position is expected to integrate with any source, perform routine data management activities, design scalable architecture addressing big data w.r.t velocity, variety, and Colome, and be responsible for compliance/audit norms.                 High-level attributes of the role -      Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture.     Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements.     Translating business requirements into technical specifications, including data streams, integrations, transformations, databases, and data warehouses.     Defining the data architecture framework, standards, and principles, including modeling, metadata, encryption, security, reference data such as product codes and client categories, and master data such as clients, vendors, materials, and employees.     Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.     Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS big data technologies.     Work with stakeholders, including the Executive, Product, Data, and Design teams, to assist with technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs. Create/Identify data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that help them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader.     Work with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems.     Collaborating and coordinating with multiple departments, stakeholders, partners, and external vendors.     must understand the system development life cycle, project management approaches and requirements, design, and test techniques.     Established and emerging data technologies. Data architects need to understand based data management and reporting technologies and have some knowledge of columnar and NoSQL databases, predictive analytics, data visualization, and unstructured data.     Well-versed with AI and AI teams - being able to provide easy access to data.     The candidate is expected to be hands-on in the development and cloud technologies AWS or Azure.     Work exp in SAAS/B2C product development for external customers is a must.     Responsibilities:      Build data systems of high availability and quality depending on each end user s specialized role.     Design and implement database in accordance to end users information needs and views     Define users and enable data distribution to the right user in the appropriate format and in a timely manner.     Use high-speed transaction recovery techniques and backup data.     Minimize database downtime and manage parameters to provide fast query responses.     Provide proactive and reactive data management support and training to users.     Determine, enforce, and document database policies, procedures, and standards.     Perform tests and evaluations regularly to ensure data security, privacy, and integrity.     Monitor database performance, implement changes, and apply new patches and versions when required.     Requirements:      Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL), and working familiarity with various databases.     Experience building and optimizing big data pipelines, architectures, and data sets.     Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.     Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.     Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.     A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large, disconnected datasets.     Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable big data data stores.     Strong project management and organizational skills.     Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.     We are looking for a candidate with five or more years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information. Systems or another quantitative field. They should also have experience using the following software/tools:     Big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Dremio, Druid, etc.     Relational SQL and NoSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra.     Data pipeline and workflow management tools: Azkaban, Luigi, Airflow, etc.     AWS cloud services: EC2, EMR, RDS, Redshift, Snowflake.     Stream-processing systems: Storm, Spark-Streaming, etc.     Object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, etc.     Well versed modern ETLs/ELTs like Airbyte, Hevodata, etc.      Education:    Any graduate with degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field.                               ?

column2: Finance Technology provides project management, business analysis, system administration, software development, QA, and production support for ABs corporate financial functions globally including Corporate Controller s group (Corporate Accounting, Accounts Payable, Payroll, P2P), Financial Planning & Analysis, Assets Under Management (AUM) Reporting, Client Billing, Advisor Compensation, Revenue Accounting & Reporting, Tax, Treasury and IT Finance     CFS manages internally developed applications and services, internally hosted third-party applications, and externally hosted SAS solutions                 Role Description:         The Sr SQL Database Developer/Architect is a key role for our firm and will own dataflows and data modelling of datastores used by Corporate Financial Systems     The role requires a hands-on developer who will own all phases of development in terms of analyzing the data needs and producing technical specifications, designing, and implementing database solutions that meet those needs, and then implementing and maintaining systems that are secure, reliable and scalable     Need to collaborate closely with Corporate Finance business team, reporting team & other database product owners     Additionally, they are responsible for leading other database developers, monitoring and optimizing the performance of the database systems, as well as ensuring that the data is optimally maintained and stored                 Applications and business or enterprise functions the role supports:         Finance technology owns multiple applications that are primarily responsible for producing Assets Under Management (AUM) reports, Revenue Accounting, Revenue Reporting, Cost Allocation, Forecasting, Billing, Commissions Processing and Analytics for ABs Corporate Finance Department     This role will be responsible for all the database applications that are supported by Finance Technology and will own some of these applications     The role will be responsible for maintaining data models, setting & enforcing development standards, maintaining and optimizing database code and processes, scheduling batch processes, interacting with business users and Interfacing with other IT professionals to source/feed data across the firm                 Key job responsibilities include, but are not limited to:         Develop, support, and maintain the datastore used for Corporate Financial applications.     Architect database models, stage, process and implement business logic.      Collaborate with business clients and other Corporate Finance technology onshore/offshore teams, help plan and execute all technology solutions and services.     Comply with program source code control, defect tracking, application development life cycle, and all other departmental processes and procedures strictly adhering to standard firmwide SDLC policies.     Support, maintain, and document application functionality, software testing and quality assurance.     Solicit and clearly document business requirements to be developed by yourself/team.     Participate in design/code reviews, project planning and estimation.     Ensure key technical and implementation risks are understood and addressed.     Willing to learn new technologies and methodologies related to software development.     Participate in the hiring and mentoring of new team members.                 What makes this role unique or interesting:         The role offers the qualified candidate an opportunity to work within a challenging and dynamic technological and business environment in which it is critical that IT can respond to new business opportunities in a cost effective and time sensitive manner                 Professional development value of this role (ie, what learning and professional growth does the role offer the candidate):         The candidate will have the unique opportunity of working alongside the Corporate Finance s IT and senior Business leadership providing solutions that facilitate immediate business improvement, interface and collaborate with technology and business teams from across the firm, and help decide how to best use technology to support the business initiatives for Corporate Finance and AB                 Qualifications, Experience, Education, Skill:         Bachelors or masters in computer science or a related field.     Strong MS SQL development skill set is a must.     10-12 years of experience in SQL server design/development/testing and production support.     Solid logical, analytical, design, and programming skills coupled with experience supporting multiple environments. column1: Bioinformatician (3 - 5 Years Exp. In Cancer Projects)
column2: Bioinformatician (3 - 5 Years Exp. In Cancer Projects) We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Bioinformatician to join our team. The successful candidate will have strong programming skills in either Python or R and should have some open source code available for review on platforms such as Github. The Bioinformatician will be responsible for developing novel bioinformatics tools and maintaining existing ones to improve our NGS pipeline as well as collaborating with the rest of the team to integrate these tools into multiple projects. Hence, someone who has good hands-on-experience in handling NGS data and doing analysis works on it with strong coding skills should apply only for this post. Key Responsibilities: Develop and maintain novel bioinformatics tools to improve our NGS pipeline. Actively enhance our NGS pipelines using publically available tools and databases. Collaborate with the rest of the team to integrate these tools into our research projects. Analyze and interpret data and contribute to the writing and reporting of research findings. Contribute to the development and maintenance of our in-house bioinformatics infrastructure. Qualifications: Strong programming skills in either Python or R. Some experience in DNA-seq analysis. Some open source code available for review on platforms such as Github. Comfortable working in a Unix environment, working with tools like Docker and writing shell scripts. Strong understanding of best practices in software development. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Good communication skills, both written and verbal. A degree in bioinformatics, computer science or a related field is preferred, but not required.

column2: Process Analysis and Assessment:Automation architects analyze existing processes and workflows to identify areas that can benefit from automation. They assess the feasibility and potential impact of automation on efficiency and resource utilization.     Solution Design:They design automation solutions and frameworks tailored to the specific needs of the organization. This involves selecting appropriate technologies, defining automation workflows, and outlining integration points.     Tool and Technology Selection:Automation architects evaluate and select automation tools, software platforms, scripting languages, and other technologies that best align with the organization's goals and requirements.     Development and Implementation:They lead or collaborate with development teams to create and implement automation scripts, workflows, and applications. This may involve coding, scripting, and integrating various systems.     Continuous Improvement:Automation architects continuously monitor and refine automation processes to ensure they remain effective and aligned with changing business needs. They identify areas for optimization and enhancement.     Integration:Automation architects ensure that automated solutions seamlessly integrate with existing systems, applications, and databases. They may work on integrating APIs, connectors, and data sources.     Testing and Quality Assurance:They design testing strategies and perform quality assurance to ensure that automated processes are reliable, accurate, and error-free.
column11: Architect, Automation, Testing

column2: At IBM, we know that transformation drives change, and it is in our DNA to continuously transform. Our Business Transformation Consultants help drive large scale change that spans IBM business units and geographies. As a part of this team, you will have the unique opportunity to be a part of driving IBM's ongoing transformation as a company that continuously innovates and leads the market. Your Role and Responsibilities We are looking to grow our Process Mining Team as part of our Finance and Supply Chain Transformation. As part of Process Mining Team, you will drive successful implementations of Celonis technology in order to meet our customers transformational requirements, accelerate the time-to-value and drive measurable business outcomes. You will work as part of an agile, international and motivated team of Process Mining Consultants and Developers. We support Fortune 500 companies across various industries to help them drive their digital transformation with the power of process mining and the objective to achieve processes excellence across their organization. To generate high-value use cases, you work closely with our customers and other Process Mining Consultants across the globe. You perform data transformations, develop analyses and derive business cases for our clients as part of ongoing projects or in early stages of business development activities. You develop data-driven process insights and actions and implement the newest features and functionalities of the Celonis software, such as Process Automation, Task Mining and Machine Learning. Your Responsibilities: Lead projects implementing Celonis to ensure the optimal solution to tackle the customer's pain points Identify process inefficiencies and understand the root causes, always in close collaboration with the customer Conduct value creation workshops and align measures to improve process inefficiencies  Quantify the business and financial potential and present the findings to the management  Set the foundation of the path to value to make the long-term customer success journey happen Support Business Development activities through your Process Mining Subject Matter Expertise as part of client workshops, marketing events and RFP responses. Configure KPIs in Celonis and create dashboards based on requirements Ensure technical specifications are aligned with both business needs and technical design standards  Partner with external consultants, solution providers, and managed services organizations to enable product/solution development as well as meeting documented standards  Interact with multiple organizations to track project progress, identify risks, communicate risks and status to leadership, and to assess potential impacts to the business.  Generate ideas and suggestions for process and technical improvements for platforms and processes supported by the team  Ensure platforms and tools meet or exceed data security standards, including internal and external audits performed  Provide solution to client being Techno-functional expert  Use strong verbal and written communication skills that non-technical business and end-users can understand.  Develop best practices for solution and tool frameworks, leveraging standard naming conventions, scripting and coding practices to ensure consistency of data solution. Required Technical and Professional Expertise B. Tech M. Tech Bachelor/Master in Computer Application 7-10+ years working experience in IT-Consulting, Management Consulting, Process Improvement or a similar area  7-10+ years working experience with Process Mining Technology and in delivering Process Mining Projects (preferably leveraging Celonis) Successful studies in Business Informatics, Computer Science, Information-oriented Business Administration/ Economics, Mathematics or a comparable degree program Certified Celonis Business Value Architect, Solution Professional, Celonis Implementation Professional or equivalent Strong communication skills and enjoy interacting with various customers Understand business processes (preferably Finance Processes such as AP, AR, OtC, PtP) Excellent analytical skills, well-organized and known for being a quick learner Knowledge of SQL or other programming languages (Python, R, Matlab...) Strong interest in Big Data, Data Mining, and Process Mining and you seek continuous improvement of your know-how  Ability to handle competing - oftentimes sudden - priorities flexibly and address each in an effective and timely manner in a fast-paced working environment Preferred technical knowledge of SAP Oracle and helpdesk ticketing tool (Servicenow, Salesforce, etc) will be of advantage Preferred working experience in Celonis Views Object Oriented Management Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise None

column2: Job Title: Database Architect  Client Facing Basic   Purpose: Architect and design data solutions for an integrated marketing data schema/mart based around our industry-leading martech software, Unica, and overall HCL Business Applications Cloud suite of products.  Responsibilities: Work closely with clients to formulate, understand and document business requirements, and then making operational data design recommendations for martech to address those requirements. Architect recommended data solution, achieving all stated goals concerning required data to support martech functionality, scale of operations, and compliance. Develop operational/functional design - Translate business requirements into a functional data specification, which clearly articulates the design and accommodates all business requirements.  Develop Technical and Database Design: Translate business requirements into a technical specification, which clearly articulates the design and accommodates all business requirements.   Logical database design: Design well structured logical databases with emphasis on fully satisfying user requirements in an intuitive, ease to use manner. Physical database design: Convert logical database into optimized physical databases, taking advantage of both standard and version specific RDBMS features, such as table partitioning, bit map indexing and denormalization. Database administration: user, object, space and code management. Security and privileges. Performance Tuning: Optimize databases for very large queries joining millions of records and for batch updates occurring within limited production windows. SQL Tuning: Work with developers to optimize Extract, Transform and Load endeavors. Specify extract, transform and load designs for taking data from heterogenous data sources and turning it into information suitable for a Marketing Data Mart.  Advise teams of DBAs, developers and system administrators in the functional/operational aspects of the operational data integration with Unica and other HCL Business Applications software.  Participate in data design reviews for the purpose of ensuring the quality of work products and for cross-sharing of knowledge.  Produce clear, concise written documentation for all deliverables. Includes schema documentation, load precedence rules, and functional design documents. Maintain excellent client relations and ensure customer success; foster referenceability. Provide domain expertise and best practices around operational data management best practices for BFSI. QUALIFICATION SHOULD INCLUDE: Bachelor?? degree or equivalent related experience in data design & development. Large relational database experience in Oracle, DB2, Teradata, including , experience creating database and schema objects. Knowledge of ETL and related tools is required. Experience with OLAP application development tools is required. Experience with sales and marketing systems in a Consulting or Systems Integration environment is a plus. Ability to work on a project team or as an individual . Demonstrated analytical and organization skills. Well-developed verbal and written communication skills. Qualified candidates must be able and available for up to 60% travel  Must be a proven self-starter.

column2: As a member of our Data Team, you will work across Capco s different domains and solution offerings to help break down large problems, develop approaches and solutions. column2: The APAC (India) Payroll Data Reporting Lead will be responsible for defining the strategy and process of data migration, transformation and load activity as well as the report development across each local agency within a market     They will be responsible for working with both the current incumbent payroll providers and WPPs newly appointed payroll providers to ensure a successful data migration     The role will require the APAC (India) Payroll Data Reporting Lead to partner with the business analysts to ensure a clear understanding and documentation of the data requirements as per the new system configuration and work with local payroll teams to extract the required data, transform where required and review prior to load to the new solution     The APAC (India) Payroll Data Reporting Lead will also be responsible for working with a team of dedicated data analysts to define required data transformation logic where applicable and responsible for data quality control and review of testing from a data perspective using Alteryx for the process     Reporting to the Global WPP Workday Data lead to ensure that data governance is being adhered to and WPP risk and controls/compliance / local data laws are respected and incorporated into the local data management strategy including data storage, transfer, data retention as well as ensuring data alignment between Workday day and the payroll vendors solution for future data integrations           Define and manage the data migration strategy and data migration process activity across WPPs APAC markets between the current payroll solutions and the new payroll vendors solutions     Partnering with the APAC regional delivery lead and business analysts to understand the data requirements as per the new system configuration and work with local payroll teams to extract the required data, transform where required and review prior to load to the new solution.     Partnering with WPPs Workday and WPPs People Data teams to ensure alignment of global data dictionaries and data descriptions for alignment of systems and system integrations to enable quality data reporting across the technology stack.     Managing and supporting a team of 3 dedicated APAC data analysts to define required data transformation logic and develop Alteryx data processes and workflows to enable data files for load within the new payroll solutions.     Responsible for ensuring data review and sign off within agencies across markets in scope prior to data loads     Responsible for ensuring data quality control and review of testing from a data perspective.     Partnering with the Global WPP Data Protection Officer to ensure that data governance is being adhered to and WPP risk and controls/compliance / local data laws are respected and incorporated into the local data management strategy including data storage, transfer and data retention policies.       What youll need:         Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or related field.     5+ years of experience in data management, data migration, data analysis or related field within the HR or Payroll space.     Experience in managing large-scale data migration projects across markets. Ideally experience with large scale transformation programs within HR and Payroll such as Workday or similar     Strong understanding of data structures within payroll systems such as ADP, Alight, Ceridian, or others     Strong understanding of data quality control and testing methodologies.     Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.     Ability to work independently and as part of a team.     Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.     Knowledge of payroll systems and processes would be an advantage.
column11: Computer science, Automation, Payroll, Data analysis, Data migration, Data management, Data structures, Data quality, Manager Quality Control, Information technology

General IT infrastructure and IT Security consultancy services including planning, design and implementation, integration, migration and administration of IT messaging, infrastructure and IT Security related people, processes and technologies.             Integration and administration of relevant technology, people and processes within relevant IT compliance and cybersecurity requirements.             Working with end users vendors and clients to produce, develop and review cloud and cloud security strategies, roadmaps and plans.             Managing engineering and planning teams, staff and/or vendors/third parties as required. A good grasp of core mathematical and statistical concepts and a creative approach to problem-solving and data science solution scoping             Strong general knowledge of machine learning algorithms and data science techniques                 Critical-thinking and strong problem-solving skills with understanding of the intricacies of deep learning and an ability to analyze and communicate understanding of data to Operational Teams.                 Understanding of data flows, data management and analysis and of techniques to develop reports to support decision-making             Expert knowledge of Python, with a good command of typical libraries for data science (NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Keras etc.)             Strong experience with Tableau and R and Visual Studio             Azure DevOps, Git, Build Release pipelines             Experience of PL-SQL T-SQL programming, including Stored Procedures, Triggers, and SSIS packages.             Ability to interpret and express user requirements and translate them into specifications.             Experience working with REST APIs and JSON data. Plan, coordinate and implement security measures to safeguard information in computer files against accidental or unauthorized damage, modification or disclosure. Review workflow charts developed by programmer analyst to understand tasks computer will perform, such as updating records.             Approve, schedule, plan, and supervise the installation and testing of new products and improvements to computer systems, such as the installation of new databases. Develop data model describing data elements and how they are used, following procedures and using pen, template or computer software.             Select and enter codes to monitor database performance and to create production database. Systems Evaluation - Identifying measures or indicators of system performance and the actions needed to improve or correct performance, relative to the goals of the system. column2: Purpose/Objective   We are seeking an experienced Frontend Developer to join our team who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming.  The ideal candidate will have 1-3 years of experience in designing and developing responsive web applications.  In this role, you will work closely with our development team to create intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces.  If you have a passion for creating visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces and want to join a dynamic team, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.  Key Responsibilities of Role   - Collaborate with the development team to design and develop responsive web applications.  - Write clean, maintainable, and scalable code using modern web technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.  - Implement and maintain reusable UI components and libraries.  - Good knowledge of UX/UI design using Figma and Adobe XD, as well as a strong understanding of designing applications that meet specific requirements.  - Ensure that the application is optimized for maximum speed and scalability.  - Design and develop data visualizations.  Experience with Power BI reports and dashboards.  - Work with the team to gather requirements and develop solutions.  - Work with back-end developers to integrate UI components with APIs and databases.  - Debug errors, troubleshoot issues, and perform routine performance optimizations.  - Stay plugged into emerging technologies and industry trends. Technical Competencies    Qualifications and Experience   - Bachelors/Master's in computer science or related field.  - 1-3 years of full-time experience in frontend web development - Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap - Familiarity with responsive design and development practices - Experience with version control systems such as Git - Knowledge of Power BI and its features.  - Experience in creating real-time charts and working with multiple data sets.  - Knowledge of basic data modelling and data visualization best practices.  - Strong communication skills and ability to work effectively in a team environment - Excellent problem-solving skills

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Natural Language Processing (NLP) Engineer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing advanced NLP models, managing the full lifecycle of model development, and ensuring the seamless deployment and operation of these models in production environments.        Responsibilities            NLP Model Development:        Design and implement state-of-the-art NLP models to solve complex problems involving text analysis and natural language understanding.        Model MLOps:        Apply best practices in MLOps to manage the model lifecycle, including version control, testing, deployment, and monitoring.        On-Premises Solutions:        Develop and maintain NLP solutions that can be deployed in on-premises environments, ensuring high performance and compliance with data security regulations.        Collaboration and Leadership:        Work closely with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, engineers, and product managers, to integrate NLP capabilities into broader systems and products.        Research and Innovation:        Stay abreast of the latest developments in NLP and machine learning and apply this knowledge to improve existing systems and explore new approaches.        Problem Solving:        Tackle challenging problems in natural language understanding and provide robust, scalable solutions.        Mentoring:        Guide and mentor junior team members, sharing knowledge and best practices in NLP and MLOps.          Requirements            Education:        Bachelors degree in computer science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or a related field. Advanced degree preferred.        Experience:        At least 4 years of hands-on experience in NLP, with a proven track record of developing and deploying NLP models in production environments.        Technical Skills:        Proficiency in Python, NLP libraries (e.g., NLTK, spaCy, Transformers), and deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).        MLOps Knowledge:        Solid understanding of MLOps principles, including CI/CD pipelines, containerization (e.g., Docker), and orchestration tools (e.g., Kubernetes).        On-Prem Solutions Expertise:        Experience in developing and deploying NLP solutions in on-premises environments, with a focus on scalability and security.        Problem-Solving Skills:        Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a focus on delivering practical and efficient solutions.        Communication:        Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. MLOps Knowledge:        Solid understanding of MLOps principles, including CI/CD pipelines, containerization (e.g., Docker), and orchestration tools (e.g., Kubernetes). column2: As part of BD Integrated Diagnostic Systems - Specimens Management business line, the engineer in this role will be a key contributor on the RD Team     The individual in this position will have a complete understanding of a wide application of engineering principles, theories, concepts, and has a full knowledge and/or expertise of other related disciplines     He/She will provide solutions that are imaginative, thorough, and practical to a wide range of complete problems     He/she will be responsible for providing product development and engineering support by playing critical role in developing / integrating / analyzing / testing / and troubleshooting medical device/IVD components and systems relating to collection, preservation, manipulation and analysis of biological samples including human blood samples             Job Description           Works under general direction to guide design and development of advanced biomedical solutions that are needed to meet key business objectives relating to the existing and new medical device products.         Guides the successful completion of major programs and at times will function in a project leadership role.         Represents the organization as the prime technical contact on contracts and projects.         Interacts with senior external personnel on technical matters often requiring coordination between organizations.         Independently determines and develops approach to solutions.         Designs and develops in vivo and invitro models to evaluate product features and improvements.         Drives creative, logic and risk-based approaches to resolve technical challenges and tradeoffs under business constrains including strong capacity for critical thinking and analysis.         Independently determines and develops technical solutions to complex problems using sound engineering principles and design of experiments (DOE) while utilizing experimental, computational and/or analytical methods.         Develops robust test methods, design test fixtures and executes measurement system analysis.         Writes, implements, and leads hands-on benchtop studies, tolerance stack up analysis, design verification, validation, vendor interactions, material specifications, component specifications, troubleshooting and/or root-cause analysis in order to evaluate product performance improvements.         Performs data analysis using statistical tools, generate reports and present recommendations to peers and business leaders.         Supports and at times lead material, design and/or process changes to existing products by following design control process and generating well-documented research and analyses records.         Demonstrate strong drive for results and clear accountability for successful and timely completion of designated tasks and projects.         Contribute to the development of new product development capabilities, methodologies and expertise by staying aware to trends in the computational and visualization technology fields and actively seek training to further improve skills.         Collects, records, reports, interprets, and analyzes data, presents results to peers and business leadership.         Provides advanced engineering skills and product evaluation support to the platform towards building business cases for new opportunities.         Contributes to development and implementation of RD strategies through evaluation of new business opportunities, technologies, and possible acquisition targets.         Ensures compliance with BD quality policies, procedures, and practices through appropriate communication, training and education of sound quality assurance principles
column11: Root cause analysis, Data analysis, Manager Quality Assurance, Diagnostics, Analytical, Genetics, Measurement system analysis, New product development, Troubleshooting, biomedical

column1: Software Development Engineer - Google Cloud Machine Learning Services
column2: Project Role : Software Development Engineer Project Role Description : Analyze, design, code and test multiple components of application code across one or more clients. Perform maintenance, enhancements and/or development work.  Must have skills : Google Cloud Machine Learning Services Good to have skills : NA Minimum  12  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : BE Summary :As a Software Development Engineer, you will be responsible for analyzing, designing, coding, and testing multiple components of application code using Google Cloud Machine Learning Services. Your typical day will involve working with cross-functional teams, performing maintenance, enhancements, and development work to deliver impactful data-driven solutions.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the development and deployment of advanced machine learning models using Google Cloud Machine Learning Services. Conduct detailed analysis of complex data sets, employing statistical methodologies and data munging techniques for actionable insights, alongside a robust understanding of statistical analysis and machine learning algorithms. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, applying expertise in diverse machine learning algorithms, including experience in implementing various algorithms such as linear regression, logistic regression, decision trees, and clustering algorithms. Communicate technical findings effectively to stakeholders, utilizing data visualization tools for clarity. Stay updated with the latest advancements in machine learning and data science, integrating innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Proficiency in Google Cloud Machine Learning Services. Good To Have Skills:Experience with TensorFlow, Natural Language Processing (NLP), and Big Data technologies. Strong understanding of statistical analysis and machine learning algorithms. Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI. Experience in implementing various machine learning algorithms such as linear regression, logistic regression, decision trees, and clustering algorithms. Solid grasp of data munging techniques, including data cleaning, transformation, and normalization to ensure data quality and integrity. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in Google Cloud Machine Learning Services. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in statistics, mathematics, computer science, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful data-driven solutions. This position is based at our Bengaluru office. Qualification BE
