column2: Job Description We are looking for a Senior Database Designer and Administrator to join our software team. The  person will be responsible for the implementation, configuration, maintenance, and performance of critical database systems, to ensure the availability and consistent performance of our applications.  The Senior Database Designer and Administrator will be responsible for proposing and Implement Database structure, architecture, and infrastructure. The database designer and administrator is responsible for defining the detailed database design, including database entities and other database-specific constructs needed to store, retrieve, and delete persistent objects. He or she will be responsible for implementing security controls to protect sensitive data.  Responsibilities:   Propose and Implement Database structure, architecture, and infrastructure as per the  requirements and as per the current technology.   Create detailed documentation including diagrams of database infrastructure.   Design and implement effective database solutions and models to store and retrieve data.   Examine and identify database structural necessities by evaluating client operations,  applications, and programming.   Oversee the migration of data from legacy systems to new solutions.   Monitor the system performance by performing regular tests, troubleshooting, and  integrating new features.   Recommend solutions to improve new and existing database systems.   Educate staff members through training and individual support.   Offer support by responding to system problems promptly.   Assess database implementation procedures to ensure they comply with internal and   external regulations.   Install and organize information systems to guarantee functionality.   Prepare accurate database design and architecture reports for management and executive  teams.   Monitoring database performance to ensure optimal performance.   Creating new databases or designing database structures for new systems.   Performing disaster recovery procedures to ensure business continuity in case of equipment  failure or any other disaster   Creating and executing backup procedures to protect data from loss or corruption   Recommending improvements to database security measures to prevent unauthorized  access or misuse of data (manage roles, permission of database users).   Providing technical support for an organizations database applications by answering user  questions about database structure or function   Installing and upgrading database software to ensure that it is compatible with current  technology standards   Manage production, QA, Staging and development database environments.  Requirements:   MCA/B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field   Proven experience of 9 to 10 years in different roles in database development and  management, including 4-5 years working as a database administrator and designer   Hands-on experience in Postgres, including the geospatial aspect of the database. Should  have decent experience on PostgreSQL community edition 9.x, 10.x, 11.x, 12.x & 13.x   Experience with replication configuration in PostgreSQL   Should have working knowledge of Python   Experience architect a large-scale production database platform   Understanding of virtualization and clustered environments   Experience working on cloud servers  Behavioral Skills:   Strong analytical skill, innovative and ability to think creatively, problem solving approach,  leadership and motivational skills   High attention to detail, ability to learn new technology, positive attitude   Self-driven, knowledge on quality concepts & result oriented   Excellent communication and presentation skills   Strategic vision and decision-making skill

column2: Solution Architects at IBM are the guiding entity in delivering value to the customer with our strategic initiatives and provide industry-leading solutions that make the world run. An architect has a sharp eye and an overall vision of how it all fits together and provides impetus to customer business. At IBM, you will use the latest software development tools, techniques and approaches and work with leading minds in the industry to build solutions you can be proud of. Your Role and Responsibilities As an IBM TM1/PA Architect, you would be responsible for Be a trusted Advisor of the Customer on IBM TM1/PA. Have the ability to influence decision makers on technical feasibility. Guide and implement strategy to transform customer business needs into a technically viable solution. Solid hands on TM1 application development experience writing TI scripts, creating rules and developing reports in PAX or perspectives. column2: As a Data Architect for Data Center Migration Projects, you will be responsible for designing and implementing data migration solutions that enable the transfer of data assets, databases, and applications from on-premises data centers to cloud environments. Leveraging your expertise in data architecture, database technologies, and migration methodologies, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and execute migration plans that meet client requirements and business objectives while ensuring data integrity, security, and compliance.     Deep understanding of database technologies and platforms, including relational databases (e.g., Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL), NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Cassandra), and cloud-native databases (e.g., Amazon RDS, Azure SQL Database).     Proficiency in data migration tools, ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes, and data replication technologies for heterogeneous data environments.     Conduct comprehensive assessments of existing data assets, databases, and applications to identify data dependencies, relationships, and migration requirements.     Collaborate with stakeholders to define data migration goals, priorities, and success criteria, ensuring alignment with business objectives and technical constraints.     Design and develop data models, schemas, and architectures that support the migration of data from legacy systems to cloud-based platforms.     Define data mapping, transformation rules, and data quality standards to ensure accurate and consistent migration of data across heterogeneous environments.     Lead the migration of databases and data stores from on-premises data centers to cloud platforms, utilizing migration tools, scripts, and methodologies.     Implement data integration solutions to synchronize data between source and target systems during the migration process and maintain data consistency post-migration.     Design and implement data security controls, encryption mechanisms, and access policies to protect sensitive data assets during transit and storage in cloud environments.     Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA,) and industry standards for data privacy, security, and governance.     Optimize data migration performance, scalability, and reliability through parallel processing, data compression, and batching techniques.     Collaborate with infrastructure and architecture teams to provision and configure cloud resources for optimal data storage, processing, and access.             Experience -    12 to 14 Years
column11: Data migration, NoSQL, data security, cassandra, MySQL, HIPAA, Data quality, MongoDB, data mapping, Data architecture

column2: Role and Responsibilities:     As a Data Architect for Data Center Migration Projects, you will be responsible for designing and implementing data migration solutions that enable the transfer of data assets, databases, and applications from on-premises data centers to cloud environments. Leveraging your expertise in data architecture, database technologies, and migration methodologies, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and execute migration plans that meet client requirements and business objectives while ensuring data integrity, security, and compliance.   Deep understanding of database technologies and platforms, including relational databases (e.g., Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL), NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Cassandra), and cloud-native databases (e.g., Amazon RDS, Azure SQL Database).   Proficiency in data migration tools, ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes, and data replication technologies for heterogeneous data environments.   Conduct comprehensive assessments of existing data assets, databases, and applications to identify data dependencies, relationships, and migration requirements.   Collaborate with stakeholders to define data migration goals, priorities, and success criteria, ensuring alignment with business objectives and technical constraints.   Design and develop data models, schemas, and architectures that support the migration of data from legacy systems to cloud-based platforms.   Define data mapping, transformation rules, and data quality standards to ensure accurate and consistent migration of data across heterogeneous environments.   Lead the migration of databases and data stores from on-premises data centers to cloud platforms, utilizing migration tools, scripts, and methodologies.   Implement data integration solutions to synchronize data between source and target systems during the migration process and maintain data consistency post-migration.   Design and implement data security controls, encryption mechanisms, and access policies to protect sensitive data assets during transit and storage in cloud environments.   Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA,) and industry standards for data privacy, security, and governance.   Optimize data migration performance, scalability, and reliability through parallel processing, data compression, and batching techniques.   Collaborate with infrastructure and architecture teams to provision and configure cloud resources for optimal data storage, processing, and access.     ?   Experience -? 12 to 14 Years   Location -? Bengaluru   Notice Period -? 0 to 30 Days    Roles and Responsibilities   Database Architect - RR/552/2024

column2: Database Architect Job Summary: We are seeking a skilled and experienced Database Architect to design, develop, and maintain our organization's database systems. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in SQL and a deep understanding of database architecture principles. Duties and Responsibilities: Design and implement efficient and scalable database solutions. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and define database specifications. Optimize database performance and ensure data integrity. Develop and maintain database documentation, including data models, schemas, and procedures. Monitor database systems to identify and resolve performance issues. Stay up-to-date with emerging database technologies and trends. Qualifications and Requirements: Minimum of 10 years of experience as a Database Architect or similar role. Expertise in SQL and database management systems. Strong knowledge of database design principles and data modeling. Experience with performance tuning and optimization techniques. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. Ability to work independently and in a team environment. Key Competencies: Strong understanding of database architecture and design principles. Ability to analyze complex data requirements and translate them into efficient database solutions. Excellent communication and collaboration skills. Attention to detail and strong organizational skills. Ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Performance Expectations: Design and implement scalable and efficient database solutions. Ensure data integrity and optimize database performance. Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Maintain up-to-date documentation of database systems. Stay current with emerging database technologies and trends.

column2: Job Description : We are hiring Principal Data Scientist for the leaders In Analytics & Cloud Applications, headquartered in San Francisco and have offices in India (Bangalore / Hyderabad). Our client provides strategic guidance and technology systems for clients wishing to solve their most complex and interesting business challenges involving cloud applications, big data, business intelligence, and data discovery. They work with both corporate technology departments and corporate business units to develop value-added decision support solutions, not just new technology deployments. Capabilities : Analytics, Data Warehousing, Cloud Data Warehousing (AWS, GCP, Azure), Big Data / Hadoop, Python, Spark & KaTa, Data Science (AI & ML Ops), Planning & Consolidation and Managed Services, ERP Analytics, Marketing Analytics, HR Analytics, Customer 360- Analytics, Retail BI & Higher Education BI. About the role : We are looking for an Principal Data Scientist (Architect) who will work on a broad range of cu]ng-edge data analytics and machine learning problems across a variety of industries. More specifically, you will : - Engage with clients to understand their business context. - Manage stakeholders independently. - Design solution architectures that are resilient and scalable. - Lead a team of data scientists and engineers to embed AI and analytics into the business decision processes. - Perform a role that involves a combination of hands-on contribution and customer engagement. - Switch between roles of an Individual Contributor, team member and solution architect as demanded by each project - Contributing to RFP proposals and effective participation/helping in sales call/pitch Desired Skills and Experience : - 12+ years of overall experience predominantly in software engineering/Data Engineering/ Data Science - 5+ years of experience in AWS / GCP / Azure - Experience in devising creative analytical approaches to solve business problems - Able to provide thought leadership in clients/stakeholders embracing MLOPs best practices, planning strategic roadmap, MLOPs blueprint/playbook etc., - Ability to write and review production grade code and helping/guiding the team in structuring the project and project artifacts - Able to create high quality technical documentation - Designing a solution approach, leading a team to deploy and maintain it in production. - Proficient in structured programming language is a must - such as Python is mandatory. - Cloud concepts and significant hands-on experience with at least one cloud provider. - Should be knowledgeable about the pros and cons of the various services and comfortable discussing the tradeoffs with stakeholders. - Understanding and proficient in CI/CD/CT process - Good understanding of various software architecture & design patterns, SOLID principles. Comprehensive knowledge of SQL skills. - Good knowledge of Data science approaches, machine learning algorithms and statistical methods. - ETL and Data Engineering pipelines using Spark/PySpark. - Workflow orchestra,on tools like Airflow. - Stay plugged into emerging technologies/industry trends and apply them into operations and activities - Excellent written and verbal communication skills
column11: Python, Data Science, MLOps, Data Scientist, PySpark, Hadoop, Big Data, Spark, ETL, Machine Learning, SQL

For more than a decade, TekMindz has led the way by staying at the forefront of adopting emerging and Disrupting technologies. Summary: The Database Architect plays a pivotal role in designing, implementing, and maintaining high-performance database systems that meet the organization's current and future needs. They are responsible for creating efficient data models, ensuring data security, optimizing database performance, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to support various projects and initiatives. Key Responsibilities: Database Design and Development:  Design, implement, and maintain database architectures that align with business requirements and industry best practices. Develop data models, schemas, and database structures for optimal performance and scalability. Performance Optimization:  Monitor and optimize database performance, identifying and resolving bottlenecks. Implement strategies for efficient data retrieval, storage, and access. Conduct regular performance tuning and capacity planning. Data Security and Integrity:  Establish and enforce security protocols to safeguard sensitive data. Implement backup and recovery plans to ensure data integrity and continuity in case of system failures or disasters. Collaboration and Support:  Work closely with development teams, system administrators, and other stakeholders to provide database support, troubleshoot issues, and assist in integrating database systems with applications. Research and Innovation:  Stay updated with emerging technologies, trends, and advancements in the database field. Evaluate and recommend new tools, technologies, or methodologies to improve database efficiency and functionality. Documentation and Reporting:  Create comprehensive documentation, including database schemas, procedures, and guidelines. Generate reports and analyses on database performance, trends, and issues for management review. Skills and Qualifications: Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. Proven experience (10+ years) working as a Database Architect or in a similar role. Expertise in database design, development, and administration (e.g., SQL, NoSQL, relational databases). Strong understanding of database architecture, data modelling, and performance optimization techniques. Proficiency in database security, backup and recovery procedures, and disaster recovery planning. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to troubleshoot complex database issues. Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams. Certification in relevant database technologies (e.g., Oracle, MySQL, and Microsoft SQL Server) is a plus. Additional Information: This position may require occasional travel or flexible working hours based on project needs. ??andidates with experience in cloud-based database technologies (e.g., AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud) will be preferred. The role might involve leading or mentoring junior members of the database team.

column2: Family Description       Applied RD (AR) consists of target-oriented research either with the goal of solving a particular problem / answering a specific question or for multi-discipline design, development, and implementation of hardware, software, and systems including maintenance support. Supplies techno-economic consulting to clients. AR work is characterised by its detailed and complex nature in order to systematically combine existing knowledge and practices to further developing and incrementally improving products, operational processes, and customer-specific feature development.       Subfamily Description       RD Architecture (RDA) comprises capturing of business, operational, technical, and / or non functional requirements from the stakeholders and the delivery of an architecture to meet the defined needs and constraints. Contains processing of use case and feature requirements into conceptual models, operational scenarios, technical requirements, and functional descriptions. RDA has a broad system and product architecture competence and ecosystem understanding.           Impact       Impact is primarily short term and and typically functional, departmental or small single geographic in scope through management of resources. Accountable for departmenta/program goals, achievement and cost performance. Actions and errors will normally impact business, program, project, function. Marked contribution to defining the direction for new products, processes, standards or operational plans based upon business strategy.        Scope Contribution       Individual Contributor: Independently carrying out consulting, specific functional work within a Business Unit/Geography. Assumes broad perspective. Resolves unique and highly complex problems within own discipline. Makes decisions about own and/or project work using known solutions as basis. Managerial/Supervisory: Typically second (occasionally first) level of solid line management. Effective management of resources and development/implementation of plans and processes. Interprets policies and establishes procedures. Increased awareness and influence of other functions outside of own business area. Decision making often repeated in similar manner - able to choose correct solution or modify existing solution.        Innovation       Highly independent and self directed. Develops plans, measures effectiveness. Assesses customer relationships and service levels. Can develop and implement complex and innovative concepts. Problems require searching and selecting. Anticipates problems, seeks opportunities. Models creative and innovative work methods.        Communication       Communicates with parties within and outside of own job function, which may include external customers or vendors depending upon the job function.Requires ability to influence others outside of own job area on policies, practices and procedures. Has cross-cultural knowledge and global mindset. Works to influence others to accept job function s view/practices and agree/accept new concepts, practices, and approaches. Requires influencing others outside of own job area on policies, practices and procedures, e.g. by expressing complex information in an engaging and inspiring manner.       Knowledge Experience       Management Experience / Mastery of a specific professional discipline combining deep knowledge of theory and practice within a function. Expert in more than one area, broad perspective. Typically requires 12+ years extensive relevant experience and/or a graduate / postgraduate equivalent degree.       Collaborate with Product Management and other stake holders to understand business requirements and use cases     Participate in customer discussions and technical workshops in presenting product architecture and capabilities     Drive the architecture evolution from an end to end perspective that meets the business needs and drive to translate the vision to reality.     Understanding ecosystem and drive the solution architecture with focus on integration and security aspects     Design and implement truly SaaS architecture, on public cloud that enables to deliver new features and capabilities in a continuous integration delivery mode     Design and implement the system capabilities for availability, scalability, high performance and observability     Define and maintain architectural specifications and data models     Evaluate and recommend new technologies and tools to support the e2e architecture     Provide technical leadership and guidance to development teams throughout the software development lifecycle     Work with the SRE/operations team to ensure the successful deployment and operation of e2e solutions     Monitor and analyze system performance and implement timely improvements     Support in the resolution of production issues, including root cause analysis and proactive/corrective actions.

column2: The  Data Architecture team  within Deutsche Bank's  Chief Technology Office  is responsible for defining and governing the use of standards that underpin the use of data and data technologies. Role Description Your role, as a data modeler, will work with change initiatives across the organization to help them design solutions that meet our architecture principles and drive the Bank towards its desired target state. You will interact with engineers, architects and technology leads to drive those outcomes, taking a position of clear authority as a steward of the Data Architecture Strategy. You will leverage your data modelling experience to ensure our data is described and structured accurately and in the most efficient way possible also aligned with global industry standards. You will work closely with cloud engineers to design and develop the next generation of the data solutions, leveraging GCP capabilities. Your key responsibilities  Support the design of logical and physical models that enable data distribution, Data quality framework and data governance, Lineage. Assists with coordination of database changes within context of overall configuration management process Govern the release of data models into production and their subsequent adoption across the organization. Embed with change initiatives to support them through their design phases, ensuring they align to the target state architecture principles and blueprints. Develops and approves strategies for continuous improvement in data management Provide guidance and leadership to perform analysis and provide solutions Produce high quality architecture definitions that become the standards and guardrails that engineers across the Bank will work within. Work with architects and process owners in Group Architecture to enhance architectural governance and review processes for continuous driving towards target state data architecture Maintain the data Lineage though effective use of tools like Collibra, PowerDesigner, Legend Identifying, recommending, and implementing emerging Modeling and IT trends, developments, tools and improvements/solutions Your skills and experience Experience of  10+  years in the following areas: Database architecture, can include architectural experience linked to Application SDLC or close collaboration with Enterprise Architects Database technologies like Oracle, PL/SQL Data Modelling, ideally at an enterprise level but will also consider application specific. Exposure to cloud migrations, ideally GCP. Financial Services sector with detailed knowledge on specific banking products (such as Loans or Interest Rate Derivatives) or functions (such as Finance or Market Risk) Functional Analysis Summarizing complex architecture design related challenges for senior management consumption Stakeholder influencing & communications. Desired : Experience working with data tools such as Collibra, Power Designer, Legend. Understanding of SDLC and technology concepts to allow effective close collaboration with engineers to resolve challenges. Data Products and Data Mesh, ideally via Dataplex Data virtualization and distributed queries AI/ML architecture Experienced working with agile methodologies Building on a very strong technical knowledge and experience base in the above areas candidates must be highly articulate and persuasive communicators, with strong collaboration and teamwork skills and a proven ability to manage the delivery of innovative solutions to a large, geographically diverse global enterprise. English written and verbal skills are mandatory; German is an added benefit.

column2: Tosca and LRE is higher priority than Octane, UFT.              Ansible, AppDynamics is good to have. Plan is to have dashboard setup for all tools which provide dynamic data to Banking management.              Activities/Experiences Required:              Knowledge of Linux and Windows OS. More emphasis on Linux.              Working experience of Azure Cloud. We support on cloud cost optimization efforts for testing tools and anything else Banking requires. Data migration experience - currently we are analyzing projects in PC 12.62 and prepare a plan to migrate them to LRE 2022.              Testing knowledge of Tosca application - must have skills include troubleshooting DEX (Distributed execution). Most user issues are currently based on DEX. column2: An Incident Management Professional is an IT professional responsible for ensuring the efficient and effective handling of incidents in an organization's IT infrastructure. The following is a typical job description for an Incident Management Professional:Responsibilities:      Monitor, track, and manage incidents in the IT infrastructure, including hardware, software, and network systems.      Respond to incidents promptly, using established processes and procedures to minimize the impact of incidents on business operations.      diagnose Investigate and incidents, identifying the root cause and implementing corrective measures to prevent similar incidents from occurring in the future.      Escalate incidents to appropriate support teams or management, as needed, to ensure timely resolution.      Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of incidents, including details of the incident, its resolution, and any follow-up actions.      Provide regular incident reports to management and other stakeholders, analyzing incident trends and identifying areas for improvement.      Develop and maintain incident management processes and procedures, ensuring they align with industry best practices and organizational objectives.Requirements:      Experience in incident management, including incident identification, diagnosis, and resolution.      Strong technical skills, including knowledge of IT infrastructure, hardware, software, and network systems.      Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, including the ability to troubleshoot complex technical issues.      Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.      Experience with incident management tools and systems, such as ServiceNow, Remedy, or JIRA.      Knowledge of ITIL (Information Technology Infrastructure Library) best practices for incident management.      Ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.      Experience in developing and implementing disaster recovery plans is a plus.
column11: Incident management

column2: The data architect would be responsible to build, optimize and maintain supplier.io s Master Database using data integration techniques to prepare and consolidate data sources in building the most accurate and complete view of business data used across supplier.io s products. This role requires the person to analyze data and system requirements then implement extraction, validation, and integration methods for existing data using skills in coding to maintain secure databases, along with maintaining the logical and physical database models.          Additionally, using mathematical and statistical theory methods they use findings to identify potential data and process issues to proactively resolve and prevent data quality errors, and report findings to management which are then used to improve various initiatives within the company. He/she should ensure that there is a provision for data security and recovery control in case of any exigencies.                 What You Will Do:                     Data Integration                 Defines how data will be collected, stored, retrieved/extracted, transformed, validated, and processed, working with key stakeholders to define data and process business rules             Designs, plans, implements data load and maintenance activities per schedule              Ensures Master Database contains most recent validated source data and applied across all downstream applications/products             Maintains integrity and high quality of data, building and maintaining processes to prevent data errors and builds actionable alerts             Designs, creates, and manages data architecture in conceptual, logical, and physical forms             Designs/Plans/Implementing Data Load and maintenance Activities                     Database Design                          Database design and development of relational and dimensional databases              Create and improve Database schemas             Considers both back-end organization of data and front-end accessibility for end-users             Manages database documentation, including data standards, procedures, and definitions for the data dictionary (metadata).             Contribute to data product and software product development activities             Develop diagrams representing key data entities and their relationships                     Database Management/Administration                         Resolves data issues reported internally and externally and builds solutions to avoid reoccurrences             Improves database release processes             Implement, control, and maintain database security (create and maintain users, roles, and assign privileges)             Database performance monitoring, analysis and tuning to include building/rebuilding indexes and optimizing database queries for quick query responses to front-end users, when applicable             Ensures availability and performance of the databases that support the Production / Development system             SQL and T-SQL stored procedure development, analysis, trouble shooting              Works with SSIS packages and SSRS Replication management             Plans, develops manages, and tests database back-up and disaster recovery procedures             Database Replication management              Installing and testing new versions of the DBMS             Migration of development to production databases                         Leadership Responsibilities                 Creating goals for the department and measuring progress towards those goals             Responsible for nurturing, motivating, and guiding the team towards achievement of team objectives             Managing and/or providing day-to-day leadership to the team.                     What You Will Need to Succeed:                       Bachelor s Degree or an equivalent combination of education and experience.             10 Years of experience in Data roles.             5 years in the role of a Data Architect managing and enterprise database             Hands on experience on SQL Server, postgres, mysql and other relational databases             Should have handled a team of Data Developers and Data Analysts.             Familiarity with data visualization tools (e.g. Tableau, D3.js and R)             Experience in Data Migration.             The ability to work to a high degree of accuracy             Ability to run insights on the data and provide guidance to make the database better.             A good understanding of database architecture, software and database management systems             The ability to work quickly, under pressure and deadlines             A good understanding of the Data Protection Act.             A willingness to keep up to date with developments in technology             Meticulous and logical in their work and capable of prioritizing tasks.             Strong problem solving and analytical skills             Strong PC skills with a working knowledge Microsoft Office suite, with strong skills in Excel, Word, PowerPoint and Project.             Excellent team player abilities with good interpersonal and behavior skills             Excellent verbal and written communication skills.              Flexibility to work in shifts             Certifications like AWS Certified Data Analytics, IBM Certified Solution Architect or any similar certifications will be an added advantage.             Knowledge of AI and ML is an added advantage.

column1: Assistant Engineer To Lead Design Engineer - River Modelling
column2: We are looking for the future of    AtkinsR alis in the present! Apply to this talent pool and be the first to be contacted for a vacancy in WE Team   .     We are always looking for top talent in this role and this application is an exercise to make you a part of the larger pool of relevant candidates who are suitable for this role.      Water Management Consultancy (WMC) is part of Infrastructure (Environmental and Water Management) within Atkins Water and Environment Business. Our clients are both UK and international, and our projects typically fall within one of the following categories: flood defence; hydraulic structures; ports and maritime. Consequently, WMC staff have a broad range of science and engineering skills including river and coastal engineering; hydrology and hydraulics; dams; weirs; hydraulic gates; ports and maritime engineering.     The role requires the candidate to support in the delivery of a wide range of projects with a particular focus on integrated water management, including hydrodynamic catchment modelling, hydrology, sustainable drainage, water sensitive urban design, river restoration, software development, research and development, as well as client and multi-stakeholder engagement.     The role will ideally suit someone who is looking for a technical challenge and is keen to work on advanced and industry leading projects.         Responsibility:       To perform this role successfully, the individual will be responsible for but not limited to the following:       Highly motivated and proactive, with a can do attitude.     Skilled at collaborative working, have good interpersonal skills and an ability to communicate effectively.      Have strong organizational and time management skills.     Flexible and prepared to take on new challenges.         Desirable:         International experience.     Chartered Engineer or working towards Chartership.     Working knowledge of coding/programming using (R, VBA, Python) will be a plus.         What will you contribute        A strong academic background with degree in Civil engineering and /or master s degree in water management/Hydrology with    3 to 15 years    of water industry experience.     Proven experience in 2D modelling using TUFLOW.     Prior experience of 1D-2D modelling using ISIS-TUFLOW and ESTRY-TUFLOW, Infoworks ICM.     Proven skills in using    GIS, including MapInfo, ArcGIS and freeware open source GIS products.       An understanding of the overall development process.     Experience in carrying out Flood Risk Assessments including drainage strategy.     Experience in FEH.     The applicant should be working towards to achieve Chartered status.     Able to produce technical reports in English in a clear and concise form.     Able to communicate effectively with both colleagues and clients and via video conferencing.     Competent in using IT including Word, Excel, Power-point, emails and the Internet.     Good presentational skill.     Managing own time.     Ability to follow quality procedures and to maintain high quality standards in own work.     Enthusiasm to learn new skills and new work procedures.

column2: The role builds, operates and improves commonly required capabilities to create and run applications in a modern way.                     Supports and consults business IT teams about the usage of these platform(s) and services to focus on delivering value at high speed.                         Key Responsibilities:                            Actively maintains recognised expert level knowledge in one or more identifiable specialisms.                      Provides definitive and expert advice in their specialist area(s).                      Oversees the provision of specialist advice by others, consolidates expertise from multiple sources, including third party experts, to provide coherent advice to further organisational objectives.                      Supports and promotes the development and sharing of specialist knowledge within the organisation.               Emerging technology monitoring               Supports monitoring of the external environment and assessment of emerging technologies to evaluate the potential impacts, threats and opportunities to the organization.                      Contributes to the creation of reports, technology road mapping and the sharing of knowledge and insights.               Programming/software development               Designs, codes, verifies, tests, documents, amends and refactors complex programs/scripts and integration software services.                      Contributes to selection of the software development approach for projects, selecting appropriately from predictive (plan-driven) approaches or adaptive (iterative/agile) approaches.                      Applies agreed standards and tools, to achieve well-engineered outcomes.                      Participates in reviews of own work and leads reviews of colleagues work.                     Designs components using appropriate modelling techniques following agreed architectures, design standards, patterns and methodology.                      Identifies and evaluates alternative design options and trade-offs.                     Creates multiple design views to address the concerns of the different stakeholders of the architecture and to handle both functional and non-functional requirements.                      Models, simulates or prototypes the behaviour of proposed systems components to enable approval by stakeholders.                      Produces detailed design specification to form the basis for construction of systems.                      Reviews, verifies and improves own designs against specifications.                       Develops and maintains specialist knowledge of database and data warehouse concepts, design principles, architectures, software and facilities.                      Assesses proposed changes to object/data structures, in order to evaluate alternative options.                     Implements physical database designs to support transactional data requirements for performance and availability.                     Implements data warehouse designs that support demands for business intelligence and data analytics.                     Accepts responsibility for creation of test cases using own in-depth technical analysis of both functional and non-functional specifications (such as reliability, efficiency, usability, maintainability and portability).                       Creates traceability records, from test cases back to requirements.                      Produces test scripts, materials and regression test packs to test new and amended software or services.                   Specifies requirements for environment, data, resources and tools.                    Interprets, executes and documents complex test scripts using agreed methods and standards.                      Records and analyses actions and results, and maintains a defect register.                    Reviews test results and modifies tests if necessary.                    Provides reports on progress, anomalies, risks and issues associated with the overall project.                      Reports on system quality and collects metrics on test cases.              Provides specialist advice to support others.       Systems integration and build               Provides technical expertise to enable the configuration of software, other system components and equipment for systems testing.                      Collaborates with technical teams to develop and agree system integration plans and report on progress.                  Defines complex/new integration builds.            Ensures that integration test environments are correctly configured.                    Designs, performs and reports results of tests of the integration build.                      Identifies and documents system integration components for recording in the configuration management system.                    Recommends and implements improvements to processes and tools.         Porting/software configuration               Configures software and equipment and tests platform-specific versions of one or more software products.                      Reports the outcome of testing and identifies potential improvements to the process and to the software products according to agreed designs and standards.                         Availability management                       Contributes to the availability management process and its operation and performs defined availability management tasks.                    Analyses service and component availability, reliability, maintainability and serviceability.                    Ensures that services and components meet and continue to meet all of their agreed performance targets and service levels.                    Implements arrangements for disaster recovery and documents recovery procedures.              Conducts testing of recovery procedures.       Service level management               Performs defined tasks to monitor service delivery against service level agreements and maintains records of relevant information.                      Analyses service records against agreed service levels regularly to identify actions required to maintain or improve levels of service, and initiates or reports these actions.               Release and deployment               Assesses and analyses release components. Provides input to scheduling.                      Carries out the builds and tests in coordination with testers and component specialists maintaining and administering the tools and methods manual or automatic - and ensuring, where possible, information exchange with configuration management.                      Ensures release processes and procedures are maintained.                       Monitors service component capacity and initiates actions to resolve any shortfalls according to agreed procedures.                      Applies techniques to control the demand upon a particular resource or service.                Contributes to capacity modelling and planning.            Supports the design of service component capacity.           Implements stakeholder engagement/communications plan.                  Deals with problems and issues, managing resolutions, corrective actions, lessons learned and the collection and dissemination of relevant information.                          Collects and uses feedback from customers and stakeholders to help measure effectiveness of stakeholder management.                  Helps develop and enhance customer and stakeholder relationships.       People Management / Resource Management:                  Is involved in recruiting process and proposes support for hiring decision and pre-selection of candidates                          Allocates the different work to the respective employees considering experience, complexity, workload and organizational efficiency                         Continuously monitors and evaluates team workload and organizational efficiency with the support of IT systems, data and analysis and team feedback and makes appropriate changes to meet business needs.                             Provides team members/direct reports with clear direction and targets that are aligned with business needs and GIT objectives                    Requisite Education and Experience / Minimum Qualifications:                  Four-year college or university degree with focus on Business Administration or IT or related areas, or equivalent combination of education and experience                    Proficient spoken and written command of English              At least 7-year experience in IT              5 years of experience in relevant area             2 years of experience in team management                   Strong understanding & knowledge of regional and global market landscape and the respective customer                      Managed critical elements and cross functional and regional projects.                     Handon experience for at least 5 years on Power BI development and any other BI tools is plus.                     Handon experience writing DAX, M-query and good have experience with Power Shell scripting or Python.                     Good Knowledge on Power BI Rest APIs or Graph APIs".                     Basic knowledge about DevOps tools (like Jenkins, Bitbucket, Groovy, Terraform etc.).                     Basic experience to Data Extraction of Power BI Azure metadata audit/activity logs, log analytics using PowerShell scripting.                   Expertise in Power apps and Power Automate                   Experience on Power BI admin skills: (Tennant & Capacity Settings, Power BI or Office 365 Rest APIs & Graph APIs). column2: Summary               To really stand out and make us fit for the future in a constantly changing world, each and every one of us at PwC needs to be a purpose-led and values-driven leader at every level. To help us achieve this we have the PwC Professional; our global leadership development framework. It gives us a single set of expectations across our lines, geographies and career paths, and provides transparency on the skills we need as individuals to be successful and progress in our careers, now and in the future.         As a Senior Associate, youll work as part of a team of problem solvers, helping to solve complex business issues from strategy to execution. PwC Professional skills and responsibilities for this management level include but are not limited to:           Use feedback and reflection to develop self awareness, personal strengths and address development areas. Use a broad range of tools and techniques to extract insights from current industry or sector trends.     Review your work and that of others for quality, accuracy and relevance.     Know how and when to use tools available for a given situation and can explain the reasons for this choice.     Seek and embrace opportunities which give exposure to different situations, environments and perspectives. column2: Data Architect with 15-18 years of experience to spearhead the development and implementation of forward-looking data architecture solutions. In this role, you will design and establish large-scale data architectures, real-time data pipelines, and machine learning processes using enterprise and open-source tools. You will play a pivotal role in transitioning data and AI workloads to cloud platform Azure. Role & responsibilities     Design      end-to-end data architectures that align with business objectives and      leverage Microsoft technologies, including Azure Data Platform, SQL      Server, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Data Factory, and Power BI. Collaborate      with business stakeholders to understand data requirements and translate      them into effective architectural solutions. Develop      data models, data flow diagrams, and system integration points to ensure      seamless data movement across various components of the architecture. Lead      the design and implementation of data pipelines for data extraction,      transformation, and loading (ETL) processes using Azure Data Factory or      similar tools. Create      and maintain data governance strategies, ensuring data security, quality,      and compliance with industry regulations. Stay      current with industry trends and advancements in Microsoft data      technologies to propose innovative solutions that enhance our data      capabilities. Collaborate      with development teams to optimize query performance, database indexing,      and data partitioning strategies. Provide      technical guidance to development teams and ensure adherence to data      architecture standards. Conduct      performance tuning, troubleshooting, and optimization activities for data      solutions. Monitor      and evaluate the effectiveness of implemented data solutions, identifying      areas for improvement and driving continuous enhancements. Preferred candidate profile     Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. Master's degree is a plus. Proven architectural expertise with 8 to 10 years as a Data Architect with a strong focus on Microsoft technologies. In-depth knowledge of Microsoft Azure Data Platform, SQL Server, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Data Factory, and Power BI. Solid understanding of data modeling, database design principles, and ETL processes. Experience in designing and implementing data pipelines for large-scale data transformations and integrations. Proficiency in data governance, data security, and data quality best practices. Familiarity with cloud data storage solutions and hybrid cloud architectures. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to think strategically about technical solutions. Excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders. Microsoft certifications related to data technologies (e.g., Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Engineer, Microsoft Certified: Data Analyst Associate) are a plus.

column2: RTL Design: Create RTL descriptions of digital circuits using hardware description languages (HDLs) such as VHDL or Verilog     This includes specifying the functionality and interconnections of registers, logic elements, and data paths     Design Verification: Develop verification plans, testbenches, and test cases to confirm that the RTL design meets its requirements     This often involves simulation, formal verification, and other testing methods     Synthesis: Prepare RTL code for synthesis tools to generate gate-level netlists that can be implemented on hardware     Timing Analysis: Analyze and optimize the timing performance of digital circuits to ensure they meet the required clock frequency and performance goals     Low-Power Design: Implement power-efficient techniques to reduce power consumption in digital circuits, which is particularly important in modern electronics     FPGA/ASIC Design: RTL Design and Verification Professionals may work on field-programmable gate array (FPGA) or application-specific integrated circuit (ASIC) designs, depending on the application     Coding Standards: Follow coding standards and best practices for RTL design and verification to ensure consistency, maintainability, and collaboration with other team members

column1: Solution Data Architect  (Snowflake Data Cloud) - Dubai
column2: Job Overview: As a Senior Data Architect at our consulting firm, you will lead data architecture efforts for our clients, ensuring alignment with their business objectives, technology requirements, and industry best practices. Your role will be pivotal in designing, implementing, and governing enterprise-wide data strategies, with a focus on leveraging the Snowflake Data Cloud. We prefer candidates with a consulting company background to bring diverse perspectives and experiences to our team. Responsibilities: Enterprise Data Strategy:    Collaborate with key stakeholders to analyze business needs and data requirements across various departments.    Define the target state data architecture, aligning with business objectives and technology roadmap.    Develop and implement data governance policies, standards, and procedures, ensuring compliance with international data privacy standards.    Recommend and implement data management solutions, emphasizing the Snowflake Data Cloud as an enterprise data platform. Solution Architecture:    Develop comprehensive solution architecture artifacts including playbooks and runbooks (or solution blueprints) to guide the implementation of data solutions.    Create detailed solution designs, considering scalability, performance, and security, with a focus on the Snowflake Data Cloud.    Select and configure appropriate data integration tools and technologies, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems.    Ensure data quality, consistency, and accessibility across the organization through robust data handling processes. Implementation Roadmap Planning and Advisory:    Work closely with stakeholders to identify and prioritize analytics use cases that align with business objectives.    Develop a structured methodology for assessing and scoring analytics use cases based on various criteria such as feasibility, impact, and strategic alignment.    Lead workshops and brainstorming sessions to gather and refine analytics use cases, ensuring comprehensive coverage of business needs.    Collaborate with data engineers and analysts to evaluate the technical feasibility and resource requirements for each use case.    Develop detailed implementation plans for prioritized analytics use cases, outlining the required data sources, analytical methods, and technology stack.    Provide strategic guidance on the sequencing and phasing of analytics initiatives to maximize business value and minimize implementation risks. Candidates Profile:  BE/ B Tech with 12+      years of experience in data architecture, data management, or related      fields, with significant exposure to airport environments or related      industries, demonstrating a deep understanding of aviation data management      challenges, requirements, and industry-specific best practices. Ready to work onsite at      Dubai  Can join within 30 days  Experience      working in consulting roles, providing advisory services on data strategy      and implementation, with a strong track record of delivering value to      clients. Expertise in      Snowflake, including advanced knowledge of Snowflake Data Cloud      functionalities and applications in airport data management and analytics. Certification in      relevant technologies or methodologies, such as Snowflake, TOGAF, or      DAMA-DMBOK, with demonstrated applications in airport environments.

column2: Workday is embarking on our next growth adventure       As our Business Technology team continues its mission to deliver unparalleled value to our business partners and customers, we are expanding our presence in the Asia-Pacific region with   a new Business Technology office in Pune, India       This new office will be an essential development center to propel the growth of our company through transformational programs for Go-To-Market and Enterprise Data Analytics teams     If you want to be a part of building something big that will drive value throughout the entire global organization, then this is the opportunity for you     You will be working on top priority initiatives that span new and existing technologies - all to deliver outstanding results and experiences for our Customers and employees      Our Enterprise Architecture and Data Services team is currently looking for an MDM Developer       The MDM Developer will be part of the Enterprise Architecture Data team and will work closely with Data Governance teams, business stakeholders, application architects and the Data Services team in deploying and maintaining robust Master Data Management solutions     This is a hands-on technical role, responsible for design, development and deployment of Reltio end-to-end implementation, including core MDM, Data Quality, Data Governance and Metadata Management solutions              Key Responsibilities:           Work closely with solution architect, business analysts, product owners to understand the data business process and work on development activities. column2: As a Lead Architect for Data, you?re eager to jump into a brand new learning experience. We need a Lead Architect for Data to have fun analyzing complex, massive data sets,  building amazing tools and gaining insights from it all. If this sounds like you, please read on!   Who You Are You entrepreneurial instincts recognize the opportunity of working at a startup-within-a-startup You are extraordinarily well versed in the latest data architectural and modeling principles You are likeable You believe every experience, good or bad, is an opportunity to learn and do better. You are convinced that the best use of experience is to leverage it to learn more You are like a kid in a candy shop when it comes to new database technologies You are respected and your opinions have enormous influence among your peers Your enthusiasm easily persuades others You believe that deadlines are sacrosanct People come to you to solve their disagreements You are a data-modeling god You can navigate the maze of columnar and NoSQL databases as comfortably as your keyboard You?re politically neutral within your organization   What You Want From Your Next Career Move To change the world by managing a team of data researchers, engineers and analysts. To learn and grow. To help people engage with their health and well-being through data.   Why We Need You FitFyles is using data to deliver the best health information to the users that need it. Find insights in data to help us save lives. At FitFyles, our success is based on our ability to dive deep into complex and data-intensive challenges to find scalable solutions to some of today's most pressing health care problems.   We need your unique skills to: Build tools and products that will help us discover unexpected insights and understand data to drive better decisions Help define and track, alongside our product and engineering teams, the metrics that will measure our success, from the utility of new features to our ultimate goal of measurably prolonging life expectancy Pioneer new uses of data to create meaningful user growth and engagement Grow and manage a team of top-tier data researchers, engineers, and analysts to help change the way people think about and relate to their health and health data   How You?re Changing Global Healthcare Using data, you?ll connect people with trustworthy physicians,to bring concierge medicine and peace of mind to millions of people around the world. What you?ve accomplished: Masters Degree (PhD is a plus) in a quantitative discipline (applied mathematics, statistics, CS, or related field) 3+ years of experience in big data analysis- especially in building large scale, efficient and real-time solutions Very strong logical problem solving abilities and a solid knowledge of the tools of the trade, including common and open data and analytical frameworks like- Spark, Spark SQL, Hadoop, SQL, R, etc.Working knowledge of scripting languages, especially Ruby on Rails, and Python. A thorough understanding of A/B testing and experience implementing it at scale (preferred) Startup or equivalent experience (preferred) and the drive to live the dream (required)

column2: The Principal Engineer will be a senior technical expert involved in the design and implementation of our cloud data platform. They will work closely with Architects, DevOps, Data Engineers, and Quality Engineers to ensure alignment and improve our ability to deliver.? The Principal Engineer needs to have knowledge of all the different aspects of technical delivery for a cloud data platform as well as the ability to understand and translate business requirements into robust technical solutions.     Strong understanding of GCP environment and offerings   Experience in at least 2 sizeable GCP projects as a Senior Engineer or Architect   Strong in Data Architecture and Data Management (Catalog, Modelling, ETL, Data Warehousing trends) ??Data Warehouses, Data Lake, RDBMS, Data Governance, Data Quality, Data Lineage   Strong Hands-on experience in native services like BigQuery, DataFlow, Cloud Storage, Cloud Functions, Cloud Composer, APIs (with multiple technologies like Python, .net etc.)   Aware of other services and frameworks and how they can be used to solve problems   Understand and guide the current architecture and work directly with Scrum teams to implement and improve the Data Platform.   Candidates should be flexible / willing to work across all phases of delivery.? Solution design, POC, development and testing.? Able to support multiple Scrum teams in various locations, both domestic and international.       Day-to-day Responsibilities       You will be responsible for working closely with the development leads, architects, and team members to design and review the end-to-end solution, take on hands-on development of the technically complex components to help the development teams, and help in troubleshooting technical issues.   You will assist Scrum teams with the adoption of new technologies and share your knowledge and mentor team members.   You are responsible for the management and mitigation of technical risks, ensuring that the data platform can be realistically delivered by the underlying technology components in a high-performing way.   Be the go-to person for the Scrum teams in case of any questions/issues and help drive the teams in the right direction.   Own and communicate technical architecture and implementation.   Provide cost optimization strategies for the implementation   Should be able to contribute to developing code along with scrum teams.       Required Skills and Experience       At least 7-10 years overall experience, with minimum 3 years relevant experience in similar roles.   Bachelor?? Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Math or related fields.   Strong data engineering skills and GCP services.   Solid background in cloud-first environments and building cloud-native platforms.   Hands-on, "roll up your sleeves" collaborative style of working.   Experience consuming data from a variety of sources (various APIs, microservices, event streams, etc.).   Experience in Automotive industry is a plus, and curiosity is a requirement.

column1: Assistant Engineer To Lead Design Engineer - River Modelling
column2: We are looking for the future of    AtkinsR alis in the present! Apply to this talent pool and be the first to be contacted for a vacancy in WE Team   .     We are always looking for top talent in this role and this application is an exercise to make you a part of the larger pool of relevant candidates who are suitable for this role.      Water Management Consultancy (WMC) is part of Infrastructure (Environmental and Water Management) within Atkins Water and Environment Business. Our clients are both UK and international, and our projects typically fall within one of the following categories: flood defence; hydraulic structures; ports and maritime. Consequently, WMC staff have a broad range of science and engineering skills including river and coastal engineering; hydrology and hydraulics; dams; weirs; hydraulic gates; ports and maritime engineering.     The role requires the candidate to support in the delivery of a wide range of projects with a particular focus on integrated water management, including hydrodynamic catchment modelling, hydrology, sustainable drainage, water sensitive urban design, river restoration, software development, research and development, as well as client and multi-stakeholder engagement.     The role will ideally suit someone who is looking for a technical challenge and is keen to work on advanced and industry leading projects.         Responsibility:       To perform this role successfully, the individual will be responsible for but not limited to the following:       Highly motivated and proactive, with a can do attitude.     Skilled at collaborative working, have good interpersonal skills and an ability to communicate effectively.      Have strong organizational and time management skills.     Flexible and prepared to take on new challenges.         Desirable:         International experience.     Chartered Engineer or working towards Chartership.     Working knowledge of coding/programming using (R, VBA, Python) will be a plus.         What will you contribute        A strong academic background with degree in Civil engineering and /or master s degree in water management/Hydrology with    3 to 15 years    of water industry experience.     Proven experience in 2D modelling using TUFLOW.     Prior experience of 1D-2D modelling using ISIS-TUFLOW and ESTRY-TUFLOW, Infoworks ICM.     Proven skills in using    GIS, including MapInfo, ArcGIS and freeware open source GIS products.       An understanding of the overall development process.     Experience in carrying out Flood Risk Assessments including drainage strategy.     Experience in FEH.     The applicant should be working towards to achieve Chartered status.     Able to produce technical reports in English in a clear and concise form.     Able to communicate effectively with both colleagues and clients and via video conferencing.     Competent in using IT including Word, Excel, Power-point, emails and the Internet.     Good presentational skill.     Managing own time.     Ability to follow quality procedures and to maintain high quality standards in own work.     Enthusiasm to learn new skills and new work procedures.

column2: As part of building our team in India, we are looking for engineers and leaders who are passionate about working on the RDBMS technology of massive scale and one that thrives with continuous innovation       We are looking for a Database Kernel Development Architect who has strong database internals work experience     You will work with a team that is responsible for architecting, developing and testing of a RDBMS     In this role, you will participate in design and architecture reviews, test plan reviews, and code reviews, even on projects you are not directly executing day to day, and do hands-on coding for one or more projects     Work closely with team of top talent and highly motivated software engineers with varying levels of expertise in relational database development     Invest heavily in coaching and mentoring the LMTS and PMTS Engineers that you work with, giving special emphasis to defining and solving non-functional requirements            As an architect of the database development team, you will be responsible for             Architecting, designing and coding the features for high quality       Participate in design and architecture reviews, test plan reviews, and code reviews     Proactively inspect and assess the quality of the work being done by the Engineering teams in the organizations that you support     Prioritize delivering working product to customers over architectural purity, focusing on real-world solutions     For your teams proposals, vet plans for technical feasibility and proactively communicate risks that the teams might not see       Demonstrate engineering expertise by working closely with architects, and engineering managers to execute on the strategy for your feature areas, help plan the backlogs, and enable your Scrum team to execute that roadmap flawlessly        Demonstrate deep understanding of customer use cases to guide architectural decisions.     Assess the feasibility of technical feature proposals.     Engage with Directors and Senior Directors every day to help them leverage the technical capabilities of their teams and to understand the risks and benefits of different proposals.     Explore cutting edge technologies, design patterns, and Engineering Best Practices, and coach Technical Leads on their application.     Write proposals and assessments that you share broadly across your organization for comment and review.       Drive cross team collaborative work environment with other Scrum Leads and        engineering managers that fosters autonomy, innovation, learning, respect and       transparency while holding a high bar for delivery              Requirements:             BE/BTech/MTech in computer science, or a related field         10+ years of experience with relational database kernel development, demonstrated by working on designing , architecting critical areas of a successful commercial or an open source RDBMS         Excellent communication skills and problem-solving skills         Experience with highly-scalable and highly-available systems         Experience working with a group of developers in a high-pace high-demand environment         Proficiency in C/C++ software development

column2: Job Location: Mumbai Job Title: Oracle Database Administrator About the Business:   The Customer Success Services (CSS) is a unit within the Oracles Customer Service Organization that establishes long-term relationships with many of Oracle's customers through annuity-based service contracts and project based one-time services. CSS services team sells from a broad IT-services portfolio both in fixed price and T&M basis. CSS services are typically requested by large Oracle customers that require the utmost attention to real critically important applications and processes. CSS covers the majority of large scale Oracle customers. Oracle Customer Success Services provides unmatched, tailored support that ensures organizations Oracle technology investments deliver the cutting-edge innovation and performance your business requires to compete, all while coexisting within your IT environment. CSS is industry-leading expertise with the highest customer satisfaction to support organizations business every step of the way. Open to travel locally and customer location.

column1: Sr. Eng. II, Ent Arch Engineering Practices
column2: The primary tasks associated with this role are to use data quality tool to profile the project source data, cleanse and accurately check the project data, check for duplicate or redundant records, and provide exception management capabilities to business using Informatica data quality (IDQ)      Responsible for data profiling, Scorecards and build custom and complex business data quality rules to support different business needs.      Takes complete responsibility of design, development, testing, deploying, and documenting data quality procedures and the exception management processes with minimal support from the lead developer      Work closely with data stewards, ETL developers, and business analysts to analyze and translate business needs into an data quality management architecture that seamlessly integrates with the current system and data assets with the new strategy     Partner with data stewards and business teams to provide summary results of data quality analysis, which will be used to make decisions regarding how to measure business rules and quality of the data     Develop a strong understanding of end-to-end investment management processes, the required data to support these processes, and the data quality and delivery issues that may impact the business on an on-going basis     Help to compile management reporting dashboards of data quality metrics for the organization using reporting tools like Power B.I and others     Develop the vision for an ever-evolving Data Quality improvement strategy that not only satisfies current needs but can be easily adapted to future needs as new sources of data input and requirements for data output are identified     Support and address any issues or enhancement requests in stipulated time.     Work with Business Analysts, Data Governors to assist in onboarding data into the lake, strengthening Taxonomy, building end to end metadata lifecycle in Data Governance tool     Work alongside data governor, business analyst to provide metadata support for key projects     Ensure that the key data elements detailed in Data Governance tools align with the pre-defined Standards     Build control around content captured in Data Governance tools by providing right access levels to users & handling Audit process     Test and explore new features available in tools to recommend better usage. column2: Project Role : Software Development Engineer Project Role Description : Analyze, design, code and test multiple components of application code across one or more clients. Perform maintenance, enhancements and/or development work.  Must have skills : Google Cloud Machine Learning Services Good to have skills : NA Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : BE Summary :As a Software Development Engineer, you will be responsible for analyzing, designing, coding, and testing multiple components of application code using Google Cloud Machine Learning Services. Your typical day will involve working with cross-functional teams, performing maintenance, enhancements, and development work to deliver impactful data-driven solutions.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the development and deployment of advanced machine learning models using Google Cloud Machine Learning Services. Conduct detailed analysis of complex data sets, employing statistical methodologies and data munging techniques for actionable insights, alongside a robust understanding of statistical analysis and machine learning algorithms. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, applying expertise in diverse machine learning algorithms, including experience in implementing various algorithms such as linear regression, logistic regression, decision trees, and clustering algorithms. Communicate technical findings effectively to stakeholders, utilizing data visualization tools for clarity. Stay updated with the latest advancements in machine learning and data science, integrating innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Proficiency in Google Cloud Machine Learning Services. Good To Have Skills:Experience with TensorFlow, Natural Language Processing (NLP), and Big Data technologies. Strong understanding of statistical analysis and machine learning algorithms. Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI. Experience in implementing various machine learning algorithms such as linear regression, logistic regression, decision trees, and clustering algorithms. Solid grasp of data munging techniques, including data cleaning, transformation, and normalization to ensure data quality and integrity. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in Google Cloud Machine Learning Services. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in statistics, mathematics, computer science, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful data-driven solutions. This position is based at our Bengaluru office. Qualification BE
